reviews.text: We stayed here for one night and found it to be a nice location with basic amenities for the price. Nothing fancy, but for the price of $80usd on a Holiday, it was perfect. We had a room with two double beds, air conditioning, television and wifi.
reviews.title: Good for the price.

reviews.text: long story short. considering there are 100+ more options to stay in Playa del Carmen, this would be the last place i would choose to stay again, unless ofcourse, the italian lady at the front desk doesnt work there any more, we were 8 people, and to each and everyone of us, she was very rude in the way she treats the guests. I would simply choose another place. And as i said before, too bad, because the accomodations vs the price is totaly worth it.
reviews.title: nice place! too bad that the italian girl at the front desk doesnt know anything about costumer service!
